**Tesouro Selic — Daily Compounding (Business Days)**

```{r}
#| eval: true
#| results: asis
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
library(webexercises) 
library(knitr)
set.seed(601)
P   <- round(runif(1, 8000, 15000), 2)
r   <- round(runif(1, 0.09, 0.14), 4)
du  <- sample(20:45, 1)
Vdu <- P * (1 + r)^(du/252)
ans <- round(Vdu, 0)
cat(sprintf("Initial amount: <b>R$ %s</b> &nbsp; | &nbsp; Annual rate: <b>%1.2f%%</b> &nbsp; | &nbsp; Business days: <b>%d</b>",
            format(P, big.mark=".", decimal.mark=","), 100*r, du))
```

Using the 252-day convention, compute the **gross amount (R$)** at the end of the period.
